content.rendered:
Employment Status : Full Time
Experience : 0 – 1 Yrs

Greeting Of The Day.
We Have Required For The Post Of Content Writer / Back Office Assistant.
We are on the way to launch in India and it is looking for some employees as a content writer to write some content daily / Back Office.
They have to post some ads also on the given portal user credentials.
Data entry skill. Typing must be good.
Work From Home.

18+ as India govt. rule.

Interested job seekers, please get in touch with us.
Location: Jaipur.
Share Your Resume On Whats!App (95-084-26-943) Hiring Employer .
Thanks Regard Hr Team.

Skills
Designing ,

Qualifications
XII Std./Plus Two (Higher Secondary)
